meaningMnemonic:
If you make <kanji>lively</kanji> <kanji>use</kanji> of something, you're probably <vocabulary>utilizing</vocabulary> it or making <vocabulary>practical use</vocabulary> of it.

活用 means making full use of something. In the context of Japanese grammar, 活用 also refers to the <vocabulary>conjugation</vocabulary> of verbs and adjectives.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
